characters.name: guard1
characters.quote: The food today taste great. You should go to the Kitchen and have some... If you have the PASSWORD, of course.

characters.name: prisoner
characters.quote: Please set me free!!! If you do, I'll give you the PASSWORD to get into the Great Hall.

characters.name: cook
characters.quote: Now where did I put that nightshade? We need that to POISON... err, Hey, there!...

characters.name: servant
characters.quote: Take the KNIFE. You never know when you might need it.

characters.name: guard1
characters.quote:
Only Knights and Royalty are allowed through here.
(Both guards have a silver SWORD with an emblem on the hilt that matches the crest on their TUNIC's)

characters.name: guard2
characters.quote:
This shift feels like it's never going to end.(You see that both guards' TUNIC's have the same crest.
That must be this Kingdom's crest)

characters.name: king's hand
characters.quote: This is the 'key' to the Wizard's Foyer

characters.name: monster
characters.quote:
The monster dazedly lifts it's head up, blinks it's eyes open, sniffs a bit... and goes back to sleep.
Those robes must've fooled it.

characters.name: evil wizard
characters.quote: What do you want, weakling? I suppose you were sent to kill me? *Laughs Maniacally* HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!

characters.name: queen
characters.quote:
Hello Wizard Assassin, I've called you here because I have a special mission for you.
As you are well aware the Kingdom to the South has been mercilessly invading neighboring Kingdom's, slaughtering countless innocents, and it appears that we may be their next target.
What you may not know is that we have gathered intel from a spy that this ruthless bloodshed is only occurring due to the influence of a powerful spell being placed on the entire Kingdom by an Evil Wizard.
My plea for you and that of our people is for you to infiltrate the Kingdom to the South and ASSASSINATE this Evil Wizard.
We know that this Wizard is guarded by a vicious monster but our inside source tells us that this beast is loyal only to the Evil Wizard.
It relies mostly on scent, so you should be able to find something of the WIZARD's to trick the monster, ROBES, perhaps.
Please spare as many lives as you can, since we don't believe any folk in the Kingdom to be acting of their own volition.
When you're ready to go, I'll use this scroll to transport you to the Kingdom to the South.
Are you ready?
